Forecast Products, Interpretation, and Discussion¶

Here are a vareity of resources ranging from polished, professional forecast products to blogs and forecast discussions.

NAV Canada GFA¶

https://plan.navcanada.ca/gfa/ Short range aviation forecast for Canada. Gives high resolution insight to frontal, precipitation, and cloud motion. Cannot take a nationwide look, only each GFA sector.

FOCN45¶

https://prairiewx.ca/conv_otlk/ The website I have listed here for access also provides the ECCC thunderstorm outlook in the same place (thanks to Ryan). The FOCN45 gives a broad overview of significant weather in western Canada over the coming few days.

  • Observations
  • ECCC Analyses
  • College of DuPage Satellite & Radar
  • ECCC Satellite & Radar
  • Mesonet Portal
  • Canadian Drought Monitor
  • Forecast Models
  • Windy
  • BlueSky - Smoke
